duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify, develop and maintain distribution channels and direct accounts for the promotion of AC complete product portfolio, policies and procedures.
Support distribution sales personnel, including training and development of new and existing business.
Monitor and implement company policies and procedures with distribution and end-users.
Develop and implement sales initiatives to penetrate and grow sales at identified strategic customers and targets.
Report market conditions, competition, distribution disputes, large project, and product needs.

education_certification.credential: University Degree or equivalent sales experience required.
